cast.name: 思德拉·卡娜马吉纳 Stella Carnacina
艾丽卡·布兰克 Erika Blanc

writer.name: 阿尔弗雷多·吉安内蒂 Alfredo Giannetti

director.name: 阿尔弗雷多·吉安内蒂 Alfredo Giannetti

introduction: Tano is an attractive sales representative who falls in love with Marianne, young daughter of the lawyer Pantaleo Fortis, said Totonno. The different social backgrounds of the two families, however, will put their love to the test, so that Tano is forced to invent a ploy to infiltrate the family Fortis: pretending, in fact, be an old childhood friend of Totonno. Once accepted into the nucleus familiareTano remains embroiled in a whirlwind of love relationships that involves not only Marianna, but also the sister of a servant Totonno and very attractive.
